CustomField.formula: If( OR(IsPickval( Current_Step__c ,"Cancelled"),IsPickVal( Current_Step__c,"Completed")), ((DateValue( New_Business_Close_Date__c) - DateValue( New_Business_Start_Date__c ) - 2*( floor((DateValue( New_Business_Close_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DateValue( New_Business_Start_Date__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))), ( Today() - DateValue( New_Business_Start_Date__c ) -2*(floor(( Today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(( DateValue(New_Business_Start_Date__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: New Business Age
